languages.text: "Нет, с ним шествовали и иные призраки, но лишь он обладал волей и разумом, прочие же следовали его велению".
"No, other ghosts walked with him, but he alone had a mind and a will. The others did his bidding."
languages.original_text: "Нет, с ним шествовали и иные призраки, но лишь он обладал волей и разумом, прочие же следовали его велению".

traits.locale_text: "No — other ghosts walked with him, but he alone had a mind and a will, and the others did his bidding."
traits.speaker: Chief

traits.locale_text: "No, other ghosts walked with him, but he alone had a mind and a will. The others did his bidding."

languages.text: 「いや、他の亡霊もいた。だが精神と意思を持っていたのは彼だけだ。他の者は彼の命令に従っていた」
languages.original_text: "No, other ghosts walked with him, but he alone had a mind and a will. The others did his bidding."

traits.locale_text: 「いや、他の亡霊もいた。だが精神と意思を持っていたのは彼だけだ。他の者は彼の命令に従っていた」
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: “不是，其他鬼魂和他一起徘徊。但只有他拥有思想与意志，其他鬼魂都听从他的命令。”
languages.original_text: "No, other ghosts walked with him, but he alone had a mind and a will. The others did his bidding."

traits.locale_text: “不是，其他鬼魂和他一起徘徊。但只有他拥有思想与意志，其他鬼魂都听从他的命令。”
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: « Non. D'autres fantômes l'accompagnaient, mais lui seul était doté de volonté propre. Les autres faisaient uniquement ce qu'il leur disait. »
languages.original_text: "No, other ghosts walked with him, but he alone had a mind and a will. The others did his bidding."

traits.locale_text: « Non. D'autres fantômes l'accompagnaient, mais lui seul était doté de volonté propre. Les autres faisaient uniquement ce qu'il leur disait. »
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: «No, había otros fantasmas con él, pero solo él tenía una mente y un propósito. Los demás hacían su voluntad».
languages.original_text: "No, other ghosts walked with him, but he alone had a mind and a will. The others did his bidding."

traits.locale_text: «No, había otros fantasmas con él, pero solo él tenía una mente y un propósito. Los demás hacían su voluntad».
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Nein, andere Geister waren bei ihm, doch er allein hatte einen Verstand und einen Willen. Die anderen haben ihm gehorcht."
languages.original_text: "No, other ghosts walked with him, but he alone had a mind and a will. The others did his bidding."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, andere Geister waren bei ihm, doch er allein hatte einen Verstand und einen Willen. Die anderen haben ihm gehorcht."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: "Hayır, yanında yürüyen başka hayaletler de vardı ama aralarında bir tek o, zihne ve iradeye sahipti. Diğerleri onun emirlerini yerine getiriyordu."
languages.original_text: "No, other ghosts walked with him, but he alone had a mind and a will. The others did his bidding."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır, onunla yürüyen başka hayaletler de vardı ama bir zihne ve iradeye sahip olan yalnızca oydu. Diğerleri onun emirlerini yerine getiriyordu."
traits.speaker: Chief
